creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: caster, baluster shaped, pierced top, pine cone finial; engraved [D] on one side
inscription:
Mark

Inscription: Engraved on the side of the bowl is the unidentified initial D in script.  Engraved on the underside of the foot are the later initials MS with the numerals 71, indicating an engraving date of 1871.
markings: maker\'s mark stamped under foot: <ZB>, Roman Capitals, a pellet between in a rectangle
title: Caster
